MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW7 postcode area of Winsford affecting properties in Station Road, Fernbank Close, Dierden Street, Nunhouse Drive, Ribble Avenue and surrounding streets. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repairs required and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:53pm on 16th December 2020
